attributes.action: Let's stop anti-social drunken behaviour once and for all
attributes.additional_details: Anti-social drunken behaviour can be stopped by hitting those responsible in their pockets.  Let's give magistrates the power to tax offenders by magistrates being able to adjust individuals tax codes or reduce state benefits.  If magistrates have powers to effectively tax offenders using their tax code or state benefits, they won't have disposable income to drink - we also might be able as a country to repay our debts or reduce taxes for law abiding citizens.
